headline: Is Enphase Energy (ENPH) Now Fairly Priced After Its Sharp Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Enphase Energy is starting to look like value or still priced for high expectations, you are not alone. The stock recently closed at US$48.23, with a 31.5% return over 30 days and a 42.9% return year to date. However, it also shows a 21.1% decline over 1 year and a 77.9% decline over 3 years. These swings have kept Enphase firmly on investors' watchlists, as the market reassesses what it is willing to pay for the business. Recent coverage has focused on how the...
